1.title: Wood you like a quest?
1.Description: Questgiver is looking for a few materials.

2.title: Thinning the Numbers
2.Description: There has been a goblin sighting. They can overrun the town if their numbers keep growing.

3.title: Ambush
3.Description: It was an ambush! You were drawn from town to leave the town defenseless.

4.title: Find the Goblin Camp
4.Description: There is a rumor that the goblin camp has been discovered. Search for the camp and report back to Questgiver.

5.title: Return of the King!?
5.Description: You found the goblin camp. All the goblins have been rallied under one banner by the Goblin King.
